Realiza este negocio desde hace 1 año con la ayuda de su madre.Le gusta su negocio pues comenta que le gusta cocinar, del mismo modo también le agrada el ingreso económico que obtiene por sus ventas los cuales le han permitido pagar sus cuentas y ayudar a solventar los gastos básicos de su hogar. Al contrario no le gusta levantarse muy temprano por las mañanas para realizar los preparativos del día, pero eso no la desanima y continúa trabajando con mucho optimismo hasta culminar el día.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 600 soles, comenta sentirse agradecida con el apoyo financiero que le brindarán para continuar desarrollando su negocio.Con el monto solicitado comprará todos los ingredientes que usa en la preparación de sus platillos como carnes, plátanos, aceite, condimentos, arroz y otros.
texts.en:
Cindy, 21, is single and has no children. She lives in her parents' house with her siblings and shares their desire to get ahead. In the evening, Cindy sells regional dishes such as tacacho, rice and chicken, beef skewers, grilled chicken, and sausages. She also cooks and sells stews and soups in the afternoons from Monday to Friday. She offers very friendly customer service and great food, which has created a warm reception and demand for her business. 

She opened the business a year ago with her mother's help. She likes the business because she loves to cook and likes earning money from her sales, which has helped her pay bills and contribute to household expenses. On the other hand, she doesn't like getting up early in the morning to prepare for the day's work. This doesn't discourage her, and she keeps working enthusiastically until the day ends.

Cindy is asking for a loan of S/. 600 soles. She is grateful for the funding that will let her develop her business. She will use the money to buy supplies like meat, plantains, oil, condiments, and rice.

loans.use: to buy supplies like meat, plantains, and oil.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Iris Guadalupe

texts.es:
Iris, se dedica a la venta de ropa. Ella es madre soltera, tiene un hijo de ocho años de edad, no recibe ayuda del extranjero; inicia su negocio a raíz de generar ingresos para ayudarle a su familia, este oficio lo realiza de 6:000 am a 4:00 pm.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar blusas, faldas, pantalones, entre otras prendas de vestir, así brindarles un mayor servicio a los clientes y estos queden satisfechos con la mercadería que proporciona. Dicha inversión le ayudara a mejorar su inventario y asimismo lograr aumentar sus ventas.
Su objetivo es obtener mayores ingresos y con ello poder mejor la vivienda para tener una mejora calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Iris works selling clothes.  She’s a single mother; she has an 8-year-old son.  She gets no support from abroad.  She started her business in order to generate family income and she works from 6am until 4pm.

The loan she needs will make it possible for her to buy blouses, skirts and pants, among other articles of clothing to provide better customer service so they will be satisfied with the merchandise she provides.  This investment will help her improve her inventory thus attaining increased sales.  Her objective is to earn higher income to make some home improvements in order to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Undraa

texts.en: Undraa is 43 years old and lives with her husband and three children in a house in Zavhan province of Mongolia. Her husband Bayarsaihan, age 43, works part-time as an interior designer. Her sons Tovuudorj, age 22, Sambuunyam, age 17, and daughter Baljinnyam, age 14, are university and secondary school students. She has been running their family business as a cobbler in a rental place since 1987. She has gained lot of experience and regular customers over the years. Her business has stopped for while because of a lack of investment and now she is requesting 2,500,000 MNT to purchase leather, soles and other materials to start making traditional and modern shoes for her customers. She is a hardworking, neat and responsible woman.

loans.use: to purchase leather, soles and other materials to start making traditional and modern shoes for her customers

loans.name: Anhmaa

texts.en:
Anhmaa is 23 years old lives with her husband and daughter in a ger in the Zavhan province of Mongolia. Her husband, Uuganjargal, is 25 and runs a taxi service in town. Her daughter Goomaral goes to a local kindergarten. Anhmaa has been working as a saleswoman in the local market since 2010. She has built a close relationship with her customers and suppliers over the years and she is now planning to start her own retail clothing business at a rental counter in the local market. 

Anhmaa is now requesting a loan of 6,500,000 MNT to purchase start-up inventory for her newly started clothing sales business. She is a hardworking, honest, and welcoming woman.

loans.use: to purchase start-up inventory for her newly started clothing sales business

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en:
Comfort is single but has two children. She owns a cement house that has electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family.

For the past two years, Comfort has operated a 'kenkey' (boiled corn paste) and fish selling business. She sells to her neighbors and passersby. Her major challenge is the high cost of corn, which is used to prepare the 'kenkey."

With the GHS 1400, Comfort wants to purchase corn and fish. She decided to join ID Ghana to access loans to boost her business and improve her living standards.

loans.use: To buy corn so that she can prepare 'kenkey' and fish to sell.

loans.name: Shinenemeh

texts.en:
Shinenemeh is 25 years old and lives with his mother and brother in a ger in the Huvsgul province of Mongolia. His mother, Tserensuren, is 49 and partially disabled, so she stays home. His brother Lhagva-Ochir, age 26, runs a small business selling firewood and coal in the local market. Shinenemeh has been helping his brother to run his business for the last four years. 

Shinenemeh is now planning to start his own taxi service business in town. He is now requesting a loan of 1,800,000 MNT to purchase a second-hand vehicle to start his business. He is a well-behaved, helpful, and hardworking man.

loans.use: to purchase a second-hand vehicle to start his own taxi service business

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario es casado con su pareja ya hace 26 años, y tiene seis hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, vive en casa propia la cual pertenece a los a ambos esposos ocupando seis habitaciones con paredes de adobe y estuco y el piso es de tablones y cemento, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona de Villa ingenio de la ciudad de El Alto.
Actualmente trabaja como artesano panificador horneando pan que vende en la misma zona a las tiendas de barrio; de esta actividad tiene un ingreso diario por las ventas. En esta actividad le ayuda su familia, la esposa trabaja a su lado y también realiza labores de casa. Ambos corren con los gastos de servicios básicos de su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para realizar una construcción de dos habitaciones por que sus hijos duermen en una sola habitación, y así  poder mejorar su calidad de vida. Necesita comprar ladrillos, cemento, arena, madera y calamina para los techos.
El sueño de Mario es ver a sus hijos profesionales.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y KIVA.
texts.en:
Mario has been married to his wife for 26 years, and they have six children who are of school age. He lives in his own house, which belongs to him and his wife, and they occupy six rooms that have walls of adobe and stucco and a floor of boards and cement. The house is located in the Villa Ingenio zone of the city of El Alto.

He now works as an artisan baker, baking bread that he sells in the same zone to the neighborhood stores. With this business, he has a daily income from sales. His family helps with the business. His wife works at his side and also does the household tasks. They both pay for the basic services for their family.

He needs the loan to complete the construction of two rooms, because his children sleep in a single room, and this will improve their quality of life. He needs to buy bricks, cement, sand, wood, and corrugated iron for the roofs.

Mario's dream is to see his children have careers.

This is the first time that he has applied to IMPRO and Kiva for a loan.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement, wood, and corrugated metal roofing so that his family will have greater comfort.

loans.name: Ana Lilian

texts.es:
Ana, decide optar por un nuevo préstamo porque se le presenta la necesidad de invertir más en el negocio de la agricultura de pipián y maíz. Este le permitirá pagar el arrendamiento de la tierra para llevar a cabo el cultivo y también comprar semilla, abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, plaguicidas para así generar una buena siembra.  
El crédito anterior le ayudo a mejorar sus ingresos, ya que le permitió cultivar una manzana de tierra de maíz. Las condiciones económicas han mejorado y las circunstancias familiares se mantienen igual.
texts.en: Ana has opted for a new loan because she has the opportunity to invest more in her pumpkin and corn crops.  This will make it possible for her to pay for land rental to do the planting and also to buy seeds, manure, herbicide, insecticide and pest poison to generate a good crop yield.  Her previous loan helped her to improve her income because it made it possible for her to cultivate a ‘manzana’ [Central American unit of land measurement] of corn.  Her economic condition has improved and her family situation remains stable.

loans.use: to pay land rental and also to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Ever Uvil

texts.es: Don Ever vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus 3 hijos de 12, 11 y 4 años de edad, es agricultor se dedica a la siembra de granos basicos: maiz y frijol desde hace varios años, con los ingresos que obtiene de la venta de sus cosechas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar y otras necesidades que se le presentan, El solicita un credito para poder pagar el alquiler de la tierra que sale mostrando en la foto donde siembra sus cultivos y para poder comprar unos pollos que le van a servir para hacer cria y despues salir a comercializarlos, para poder tener mejores ganancias y darle una mejor vida a su familia y tener una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Ever lives in his own house with his wife and three children, ages 12, 11, and 4. He has been farming for several years and plants basic grains: corn and beans. He is able to meet household expenses and pay for other necessities that come up with the income he receives from his harvest.

He has applied for a loan to rent the land where he plants his crops, which appears in the photo. He also will buy some chickens to raise and sell so that he can earn more, offer his family a better life, and have more financial stability.

loans.use: to rent land to cultivate.

loans.name: Georgina

texts.en:
This is 47-year-old Georgina. She is single and has no children. 

In 2008, Georgina established her commercial business. She began her wax-print business just to support her sister's child who is deformed now. Her business is located at the heart of town and her main customers are mostly women. Working seven days a week and ten hours a day, she earns about GHS 100 every month from this business.

She would like a loan in the amount of GHS 1,800. Georgina has already received and successfully repaid five loans. Now she requires a new loan in order to buy more wax-print. She hopes that this loan will increase her income level.

loans.use: to buy more wax-print to sell to customers.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is widowed with no children, although she is currently taking care of two family members. She has a business selling local brew and has been in this business for seven years. She generates additional income by selling charcoal.

Grace has applied for a loan of 600,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more jerrycans of local gin. She works at the market seven days out of every week and sells on a retail basis only.  Her major business challenges include seasonality and defaulters. She aspires to become a wholesaler and also to buy a plot of land to build her own house. She resides in a rented house and her family has access to electricity and piped water.  Her monthly expenses include rent, food, and electricity.

loans.use: To buy more jerrycans of local gin

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es soltera y no tiene hijos, ella es la tercera hermana de cinco. Ella tuvo que hacerse cargo de sus hermanos menores, por ese motivo no cuenta con una pareja ni hijos, vive en la casa de unos parientes primos donde no paga alquiler, ella cuenta con cuatro ambientes, donde es la cocina, baño, un pequeño dormitorio y un pequeño ambiente donde se encuentra su taller de costura, la habitación es de ladrillo con revoqué de estuco y el piso es de cemento, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona de Nuevos Horizontes de la ciudad de El Alto.
Actualmente trabaja como costurera realizando costura de buzos deportivos pero solamente realiza el armado con maquina recta, de ahí le pagan por prenda ella se encarga de sus gastos de transporte y alimentación.
El crédito requiere para la compra de una maquina overlock y así poder mejorar la cantidad de prendas  y hacer que  sus ingresos sean mayores.
El sueño de Julia es el de contar con una casita y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hermanos.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y KIVA.
texts.en:
Julia’s single and has no children; she’s the third of five siblings.  She had to take charge of her younger siblings and this is why she has neither a spouse nor children.  She lives rent-free in a house belonging to some cousins.  She has four rooms: kitchen, bathroom, a small bedroom and a small living room that contains her sewing workshop.  The house is brick finished in stucco and the floor is cement; the house is located in the city of El Alto’s Nuevos Horizontes zone.

She currently works as a seamstress making athletic sweatshirts but she’s currently doing the assembling with a straight-stitch sewing machine; she’s paid by the piece and she pays her transportation and food costs.  She needs the loan to buy an overlock sewing machine to increase production and income.  

Julia dreams with having her own little house to improve her and her siblings’ quality of life.  This is the first time she’s requested credit from IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria, de 48 años de edad esta casada y tiene 5 hijos pero solo vive con uno de ellos y su pequeño nieto en su casa propia.El trabajo de Gloria consiste en el corte y confección de prendas de vestir, se encarga de realizar sus propios diseños, además realiza el arreglo de otras prendas que le solicitan sus clientes ya que confían en que ella hará un muy buen trabajo, tiene un taller pequeño en su casa y desde ahí realiza toda su labor, se inició en su trabajo hace 8 años, empezó realizando trabajos simples y la experiencia que ha obtenido en todo este tiempo le permite crear prendas mas complejas dándoles un buen acabado y detalles personalizados, trabaja sola y esta mas que contenta porque desempeña la actividad que le gusta.Le esta yendo muy bien, ya que tiene muchos clientes quienes la buscan muy a menudo, al principio se sentía de poca utilidad en su casa pero decidió emprender algún negocio y ahora está muy contenta porque su labor le ha permitido realizar su vida con cierta tranquilidad, ahora desea trabajar mas para hacer crecer su negocio.
En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 800 soles, agradece a aquellas personas que le brindan el crédito que requiere para aumentar su capital de trabajo. Con el monto solicitado comprará materiales para poder seguir con su trabajo como telas, hilos, elásticos y moldes de ropas para confeccionar en mayor cantidad.
texts.en:
Gloria, 48, is married and has five children but lives with only one of them and with her little grandson in a house of her own.  Gloria’s work consists in making clothes.  She makes her own designs and also does clothes repairs for customers who request them since they trust her for the good work she does.  She has a small workshop at home and she does all her work from there.  She started 8 years ago doing simple jobs and the experience she’s gained has made it possible for her to do more complex items of clothing with fine finishing touches and personalized detail work.  She works alone and is more than happy because she works doing something she enjoys.  She’s doing very well because she has many customers who seek her out often.  At first, she felt little used at home but she decided to start some business and now she’s very happy because her work has led to her life being a bit more peaceful.  Now, she wants to work more to make the business grow.

On this occasion, she’ll request 800 soles.  She thanks all those people who grant her the loan she needs to increase her working capital.  She will use the requested amount to buy supplies like fabric, thread, elastic and clothing patterns to continue sewing clothes in larger amounts.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Joel Alfonso

texts.es:
Joel, se dedica a la reparación de equipos eléctricos. Él tiene 40 años de edad, está casado y su esposa tiene 35 años; disfruta de tres hijos, los cuales están estudiando. El negocio lo posee desde hace diez años y lo lleva a cabo en la casa todos los días, este oficio lo aprendió en su trabajo anterior. 
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar herramientas, repuestos para televisores, radios, planchas, celulares, entre otros. Esta inversión le ayudara a incrementar sus inventarios y obtener mejores ingresos para aportar a su familia. 
Su objetivo es fortalecer más el negocio y ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Joel repairs electrical items. He is 40 and married. His wife is 35. He enjoys his three school-age children. He has operated this business from his home every day for ten years. He acquired his skills at his previous job. 

Joel needs a loan to buy tools and replacement parts for TVs, radios, irons, cell phones, and more. This investment will help him increase inventory and increase income to support his family. His goal is to strengthen his business and offer his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy tools and replacement parts for TVs, radios, irons, cell phones, and more.

loans.name: Sarantuya

texts.en:
Sarantuya, 48 years old, lives with her husband and three children in a ger in the Mongolian province of Huvsgul. Her 49-year-old husband Tserendash operates a taxi service business in town, while her son Batmonh, age 26, and daughter Battsetseg, age 22, work at local companies. Her 19-year-old daughter Monhtsetseg is a university student.

Sarantuya has been working at a local company since 2006, but is now planning to start her own tailoring service at home. She is therefore requesting a loan of 3,000,000MNT to purchase starting inventory and equipment for the business. Sarantuya is a hardworking, enthusiastic and modest woman.

loans.use: to purchase initial inventory and equipment to start her own tailoring service business.

loans.name: Hashdorj

texts.en:
Hashdorj is 39 years old and lives with his wife and two children in a house in the Selenge province of Mongolia. His wife, Erdenechimeg, age 36, helps her husband to run their family business of organic vegetable growing and sales. HIs children, Odgerel, age 17, and Batbold, age 15, are secondary school students. Hashdorj has been running an organic vegetable growing and sales business with his wife since 2003. He has gained a lot of experience and sells his organic vegetables to Ulaanbaatar and other bigger city retailers. 

Hashdorj is now requesting a loan of 6,000,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of seeds and soils to prepare for this year's planting period. He is a hardworking, welcoming, and responsible man.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of seeds and soils to prepare for this year's planting period

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es:
Luis tienen 44 años de edad, de estado civil unión libre, tiene cinco hijos, vive con la conyugue y los Hijos en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar. 

La VRC VIRGEN DE BAÑOS está formada por en la comunidad mama Sara de Cerritos, a una distancia de 30 minutos de la oficina de la Cooperativa. Los socios se dedican a la agricultura,crianza de animales y comercio. 

Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol, ademas a la crianza de ganado, El credito lo utilizará en la compra de ganado, vacunas. 

Las compras y las ventas las realizará en Chillanes. El sueño es aumentar la produccion para tener mas dinero y dar un buen futuro a los hijos. Ha enfrentado desafios como la falta de dinero para comprar los fertilizantes para las siembras. 

Le gusta hacer deporte y festejar las fiestas de la comunidad.
texts.en:
Luis, 44, is in a common law relationship and has five children; he lives with his spouse and children in Chillanes, Bolívar Province.

The “Virgen de Baños” communal bank is formed by the Mama Sara de Cerritos community located 30 minutes from the Cooperativa office.  The members work in agriculture, animal husbandry and commerce.

Luis works growing corn, blackberries and broad beans and also raises cattle.  He will use the loan to buy cattle and vaccines.

He does his purchases and sales in Chillanes.  His dream is to increase production to have more money and provide a good future for his children.  He’s faced challenges like lack of money to buy fertilizer for his crops.  He likes playing sports and celebrating community festivals.

loans.use: to buy cattle and vaccines.

loans.name: Martin

texts.es:
Martin es un joven productor de leche el cual recientemente consiguió su pareja; viven en casa de su suegro, cuenta con  algunas cabezas de ganado de raza mejorada las cuales requieren mejor cuidado dada las condiciones climatológicas del sector. viven la zona Patapata de la provincia Los Andes del Departamento de La Paz.
El crédito lo requiere para comprar material de construcción: cemento, ladrillos, etc. Así podrá  refaccionar el establo para ganado, por lo tanto mejorar su producción de leche, haciéndola más limpia y conservando la buena salud de sus vacas.
El sueño de Martin  es incrementar sus cabezas de ganado.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Martin is a young milk producer who is recently married. He lives in the house of his father-in-law. He has several head of cattle of a good breed, which need better care given the climate conditions of the area. They live in the Patapata zone of the Los Andes province of the department of La Paz.

He needs the loan to buy construction material such as cement, bricks, etc. This way he will be able to improve the stable for his animals, and therefore improve his milk production, by making the stable cleaner and conserving the good health of his cows.

Martin's dream is to increase the size of his herd.

This is the second time that he has applied for a loan from IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, and other materials to upgrade the stable for his cows and keep them in better conditions so that they can give milk of better quality.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos. Él tiene 45 años de edad, está casado, su esposa tiene 39 de edad y posee seis hijos, algunos de ellos le ayudan a realizar el oficio; ya lleva varios años de conservarlo y es de carácter familiar, lo realizan todos los días. 
El crédito le permitirá comprar cerdos y alimento para ellos. Esta inversión le ayudara a incrementar sus inventarios y obtener mayores ingresos.
Su sueño es fortalecer más el negocio y brindarle una mejor estabilidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco, 45, works raising pigs.  He’s married and his wife is 39-years-old and they have six children; some of them help with his work.  He’s had it for several years and it’s the family tradition; they work every day.

The loan will make it possible for him to buy pigs and feed for them.  This investment will help him increase his inventory and to earn higher income.  His dream is to strengthen the business to provide more life stability for his family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and their feed.

loans.name: Nhu

texts.en:
Như was born in 1986. She has two children who are learning at kindergarten. She and her husband are carpenters. From her job she earns about 4,000,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 6,000,000 VND per month.

Như has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2009. In the last cycle, she borrowed 8,288,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,632,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. Her dream is to help her children have good careers and to enlarge her carpentry workshop.

loans.use: to buy wood for her carpentry workshop.

loans.name: Esufboy

texts.ru: Эсуфбой занимается производством лепешек. Ему 38 лет. У него жена, сын и дочь. Он со своей семьей, матерью и двумя братьями проживает в городе Исфара на севере Таджикистана. Эсуфбой имеет собственную пекарню с площадью 4х5 квадратных метров. Его пекарня славится вкусными лепешками. Кроме ежедневного производства лепешек, он также имеет частные заказы. Эсуфбой занимается этим видом деятельности уже более 9 лет. В этом ему помогают жена и младший брат. Эсуфбой дважды в месяц закупает сырье в городе Худжанде по оптовой цене. Чтобы расширить свое производство и увеличить товарооборот, Эсуфбой берет кредит для закупа муки и угля для выпички лепешки.
texts.en: Esufboy bakes flatbread.  He is 38 years old.  He has a wife, a son and a daughter.  He lives with his family, mother and two brothers in the city of Isfara in the north of Tajikistan.  Esufboy owns a large bakery that is 4x5 square meters.  His bakery is known for tasty flatbread.  In addition to his daily production of flatbread he also fulfills private orders.  Esufboy has been in this business for more than 9 years.  His wife and younger brother help him with it.  Esufboy buys fuel in the city of Khujand at a wholesale price.  In order to expand his production and increase his turnover, Esufboy is taking out a loan for the purchase of flour and coal to bake flatbread.

loans.use: to buy flour and coal for baking flatbread

loans.name: Eder

texts.es: Eder, tiene 21 años de edad es, es soltero y aún no tiene hijos porque espera consolidarse económicamente para formar su propia familia, actualmente vive en casa de su abuela junto a sus padres y su hermano. Eder trabaja como conductor de mototaxi, su trabajo consiste en trasladar a los pasajeros a su destino de manera rápida y segura. Lleva en ésta actividad un poco más de 2 años, trabaja solo y a diario renueva sus energías para trabajar con mucho optimismo y siempre dando lo mejor de sí. Por lo pronto, le gusta la actividad que realiza, aunque asegura que al principio le fue difícil trabajar como mototaxista porque tenía que enfrentar los comentarios negativos de las personas, ya que no conocía la ciudad completamente, ahora realiza su trabajo de manera óptima y sus ingresos se han incrementado notablemente, espera algún día tener un amplia flota vehicular.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 700 soles, por tanto agradece a quienes hacen posible su crédito para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado está muy comprometido a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado pagará su primere cuota para obtener un mototaxi nuevo con el cual espera seguir trabajando con mayor comodidad.
texts.en:
Eder, 21, is single and has no children yet because he wants to become economically stable before forming his own family.  He currently lives in his grandmother’s house with his parents and brother.  Eder works as a mototaxi driver.  His work consists in transporting passengers to their destination quickly and safely.  He’s been in this activity for a little over two years.  He works alone and every day renews his energy to work with much optimism always giving his best.  For now, he enjoys what he does although he states that at the beginning it was difficult to work as a mototaxi driver because he had to face negative comments from people because he did not know the entire city well.  Now, he works optimally and his income has improved noticeably.  He hopes one day to have a fleet of vehicles.

On this occasion he will request 700 soles.  Therefore, he thanks all those who make the loan possible so he can continue towards his objectives.   On the other hand, he’s committed to making his payments punctually.  He will use the requested amount for the initial payment on a new mototaxi he hopes to use to continue working more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy a mototaxi.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
Concepción, se dedica a  sembrar  granos básicos, crianza de ganado y servicio de transporte eventualmente. Él está casado  y vive actualmente con su esposa, sus dos hijos de edades de 18 y 24 años. El oficio lo realiza desde hace 17 años y lo aprendió debido a la necesidad económica para obtener ingresos. 
El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de insumos agrícolas tales como: abono, herbicidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas para preparar la tierra  y pago de mano de obra para la siembra de dos manzanas de maíz.  Este le ayudara obtener más cosecha, uno de los riesgos es por el cambio de clima que afectan directamente el cultivo, también la variación de los costos de los insumos agrícolas. 
Su sueño es seguir trabajando de la mano de la Institución para obtener mejores ganancias y asimismo mejorar la estabilidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Concepción works growing basic grains, raising cattle and providing part-time transportation services.  He’s married living with his wife and two children who are 18 and 24 years of age.  He’s been doing his work for 17 years having learned it due to the need to earn income.

He will use the loan to buy farm supplies like manure, herbicide and insecticide to prepare the soil for planting and to pay labor costs to plant two ‘manzanas’ [Central American unit of land measurement] of corn.  This will help him obtain larger crop yields.  One of the risks is changeable weather that directly affects the crops and also the fluctuation in farm supplies prices.  His dream is to continue working hand-in-hand with the Institution in order to earn higher profits while at the same time improving his family’s life stability.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Mahatma Gandhi Self Help Group

texts.en:
Mahatma Gandhi Self Help Group consists of eleven women from a village in Odisha. They formed a group to help themselves to share their problems and to solve their problems among them. 

One of them is Lili, who was selected as their President of Mahatma Gandhi Self Help Group. The lady in the front, sitting second from the right-hand side in the photo is Lili. Lili is 34 years old and is staying with her husband and her three children. Her children are in schooling. She hopes to see them as officers in the public sector unit. 

Lili has few acres of land in her village, and she is utilizing her land in vegetable and paddy cultivation. Her husband is supporting her in this activity. 

Lili has requested a loan of 275,000 INR, which will help her to purchase the required resources for sugarcane cultivation. She says a portion of the loan amount will help her to purchase sugarcane plants, fertilizers, and insecticides, and to cover operational expenses like labour charges.

loans.use: to purchase sugarcane plants, fertilizers, and insecticides, and to cover operational expenses like labour charges.

loans.name: Hamijon

texts.ru: Хамичон житель района Вахш, расположенный в южной части Хатлонской области Таджикистана. Ему 29 лет. Он женат. У него трое маленьких детей - дочьке 2 года, одному сыну 6 лет, а второму сыну 7 лет. Его жена не работает, она ведет домашнее хозяйство. Сам Хамичон занимается животноводством, а также является мясником. Он закупает крупнорогатый скот, откармливает его и затем продает его мясо на рынке в своей мясной лавке. Хамичон занимается этим видом деятельности уже 7 лет. Он научился профессии мясника у своего покойного отца. Хамичон запрашивает кредит для закупа 4 голов бычка с целью продажи мяса. В дальнейшем, он планирует расширить свой бизнес и открыть еще одну мясную лавку.
texts.en: Hamijon is a resident of the Vakhsh area in the southern part of Khatlon province of Tajikistan.  He is 29 years old.  He is married.  He has three small children - his daughter is 2 years old,  one son is 6 years old and the second son is 7 years old.  His wife does not work, she runs the household.  Hamijon raises livestock and is also a butcher.  He buys cattle, fattens it and sells the meat at the market in his butcher stall.  Hamijon has been in this business for 7 years.  He learned the butchering profession from his late father. Hamijon is asking for a loan for the purchase of 4 bulls with the goal of selling their meat.  In the future he plans to expand his business and open one more butcher stall.

loans.use: to buy 4 bulls with the goal of selling meat

loans.name: Johanna Josefa

texts.es:
Johanna, 29 años de edad, originaria de Managua, soltero, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la  venta de comida, de la que es propietaria hace mas de 5 años, debido a su situación económica en que vivía solo logro finalizar su quinto año de secundaria.
Inicio en el ámbito del comercio a la edad de 24 años, con capital propio, vendiendo frescos en su casa, fue asi que con las ganancias que le genera este negocio ha podido  emprender su otro negocio como es la venta de comida. Sus productos los  comercializan en los centros comerciales. Una de sus expectativas es hacer crecer mas su negocio con el objetivo de obtener mejores ingresos.
Johanna  esta requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar frutas, piña, melón, arroz, frijoles, carnes, azúcar, pollo, etc. Ella  estima que este crédito le ayudara a comprar todo lo que necesita en su negocio, dentro de sus planes futuro es poder ampliar mas su negocio.
texts.en:
Johanna, 29, is from Managua.  She’s single and a merchant by profession; she sells food.  She’s had the business for more than five years.  Because of the economic situation she lived in she was only able to complete fifth year of secondary school.

She started in commerce at the age of 24 with her own capital selling blended fruit drinks at home.  She used profits generated from this business to start her other business which is selling food.  She sells her products in commercial establishments.  One of her expectations is to make the business grow in order to improve her income.

Johanna needs financing to buy fruit like pineapples and melons and rice, beans, meats, sugar, chicken, etc.  She figures that the loan will help her buy everything needed in her business.  Among her future plans is more business expansion.

loans.use: to buy fruit, rice, beans, meat, sugar, chicken, etc.

loans.name: Maa Chandi Self Help Group

texts.en:
Few years back, 11 women from Chandikhole village stepped out and decided to build a secure future for their family. They formed a group named Maa Chandi Self Help Group. The members of Maa Chandi Self Help Group are all women from the district of Jajpur in Odisha, India. One of them is Mrs. Sovagini, who was selected as their president. The lady in the front standing third from the right-hand side in the photo is Sovagini. 

Sovagini is 36 years old and is living with her husband and her three children. Her husband is a farmer and has been involved in the activity of cultivation for a long time. She got the idea of doing vegetable cultivation from her husband, so she gathered some other women from her neighbourhood and told them about her plan. They liked her idea and appreciated her. She took the leadership of the group and started to cultivate vegetables and sell them in her village. 

Initially she started with growing only a few vegetables like potatoes, tomatoes, and onions but later on she grew bitter gourd, snake gourd, cucumbers, lady fingers and 'brinjal' (eggplant). She has very good relationship with her customers as she sells fresh vegetables to her customers. 

Now she has a new idea: to purchase some more land for cultivation so that she can grow more vegetables on a larger scale, for which she has requested for a loan to utilize it in purchase of land, vegetable plants, seeds and fertilizers.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing land, vegetable plants, seeds and fertilizers for vegetable cultivation.

loans.name: Luan

texts.en:
Luan is 42 years old and has four children, two of whom attend school and two of whom work.  To earn a living, Luan raises pigs and mills rice. She earns 5,000,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 VND a month. 

Luan is requesting a loan from SEDA for 9,632,000 VND, which she will use to buy food for pigs and to mill rice to sell. She has participated in the Center of Small Enterprise Development Assistance (SEDA) credit program since 2009. She wants to raise her children well, so they can get a job in the future.

loans.use: to purchases food for pig sand to mill rice to sell.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.ru:
Иван уже несколько раз пользовался кредитами КИВА. За счет полученной финансовой помощи, он смог увеличить свой валовой доход, увеличив его на 1 000 гривен. 
В этот раз Иван хочет сделать косметический ремонт в своем кафе и пополнить товар на оставшуюся сумму. За счет разнообразия ассортимента товара Иван надеется еще больше увеличить свою прибыль, обеспечивая семье более достойную жизнь.
texts.en:
Ivan has been using Kiva loans for several years now.  Thanks to the financial help he was able to increase his gross income, raising it by 1,000 hryvnia.

This time Ivan would like to redecorate his cafe and increase his inventory with the leftover sum.  By increasing the variety of his product assortment, Ivan hopes to increase his  profits even further and provide his family with the life they deserve.

loans.use: to redecorate his cafe and increase his inventory with the leftover sum

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Doña Lidia, 55 años de edad, originaria de Matagalpa, pero actualmente vive en Managua, una humilde señora con deseo de superación, ella lucha cada día por salir adelante con su familia, casada, madre de 1 hijos de 12 años, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de nacatamales, de la que es propietaria hace mas de 18 años.
Inicio su actividad laboral desde muy joven, ayudándole a su mama a hacer nacatamales, fue allí que adquirió experiencia y total dominio del negocio, luego al casarse  ella decide independizarse, la cual decidió  seguir con el mismo negocio de ventas de nacatamales, ella dice que se siente muy satisfecha porque este negocio le genera ganancias a diario, ya que cuenta con clientes fijos, en su negocio recibe el apoyo de su hijo y esposo.
Sus expectativas es seguir creciendo en su negocio. Ella esta requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar carne, arroz, papa, manteca, hojas y leñas. Toda la materia prima que necesita para la elaboración de sus deliciosos nacatamales, con el objetivo de incrementar sus ventas y obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Lidia, 55, is originally from Matagalpa but currently lives in Managua.  She’s a humble woman who wants to improve.  She strives daily to get ahead with her family.  She’s married and mother of a 12-year-old son.  She’s a merchant by profession; she works making and selling nacatamales [Nicaraguan style tamales].  She’s owned the business for more than 18 years.

She started working very young helping her mother make nacatamales.  That was where she gained experience and total command of the business.  Once she got married and became independent, she decided to continue with the same business selling nacatamales.  She says she feels very satisfied because this business generates daily profits since she has regular customers.  Her son and husband help her with the business.

Her expectation is to continue growing in the business.  She needs financing to buy meat, rice, potatoes, lard, leaves and firewood-all the raw materials needed to make her delicious nacatamales-with the objective of increasing sales and earning higher profits.

loans.use: to buy meat, rice, potatoes, lard, leaves and firewood.

loans.name: Ana Yanci

texts.es:
Ana, posee una tienda. Ella está casada, tiene dos hijos, los cuales tienen edades de 6 y 9 años; no recibe ayuda económica del extranjero, inicia este trabajo como una fuente de ingresos para aportar a su familia, este lo realiza de 6:00 am a 4:00 pm y ya  tiene dos años de llevarlo a cabo. 
El crédito que requiere le permitirá comprar churros, soda, dulces, jabón, aceite, frijoles, arroz, entre otros productos para surtir el negocio. Este le permitirá aumentar su mercadería, mejorar las ventas e incrementar la clientela.
Su objetivo es optimizar las ventas, ampliar el negocio, asimismo mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana has a store. She is married and has two children, ages 6 and 9. She doesn't receive economic help from abroad. She began this work as a source of income to support her family. She works from 6:00 am to 4:00 pm, and she has already been doing it for two years.

The loan that she needs will allow her to buy churros (a doughnut-like snack), soda, candy, soap, oil, beans, and rice, among other products to stock her business. This will allow her to expand her merchandise, improve sales, and increase her clientele.

Her goal is to optimize her sales and enlarge her business and also to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy churros, soda, sweets, soap, oil, beans, and rice, among other items.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es:
Marta, solicita un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de seguir invirtiendo en el negocio y así aumentar su inventario de medicina, ya que permite generar entradas de dinero. Este le ayudara a comprar vitaminas, jarabes, entre otro tipo de medicamento para brindarle un mejor servicio a los clientes. 
El crédito anterior le permitió mejorar su negocio, aumentar la clientela y con ello obtuvo mayores ingresos. Las circunstancias familiares han mejorado, ya que ha tenido una estabilidad de vida favorable.
texts.en:
Marta is requesting a new loan to continue investing in the business thus increasing her inventory of medicine since it makes it possible for her to generate income.  This will help her buy vitamins and syrups, among other types of medicine to provide better customer service.

Her previous loan made it possible for her to improve her business, to increase clientele and thus obtaining higher income.  Her family situation has improved since her life stability has been favorable.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and syrups, among other types of medicine.

loans.name: Radhakrushna Self Help Group

texts.en:
Laxmipriya is a 26-year-old woman married to a worker of Chandikhole village in Odisha, India. The couple has three children who are in school. Laxmipriya lives with her children and, together with her husband, takes care of all the household expenses. 

In order to help with all the family expenses, Laxmipriya has been involved in doing paddy cultivation and selling it to the distributors for the past four years. She supplies her paddy and rice to the rice dealers in the nearby market. 

In order to strengthen the business and respond to client demand, Laxmipriya, together with the group Radhakrushna SHG, is requesting a loan from Peoples Forum for purchasing fertilizers, pesticides, and seeds, and to cover the operational costs. Their goal is to increase their business activity.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, pesticides, and seeds, and to cover their operational costs for paddy cultivation.

loans.name: Purevbat

texts.en:
Mr.Purevbat is 31 years old and lives with his wife and three children in a house in Huvsgul province, Mongolia. His wife Bolormaa, age 31, stays home taking care of their newborn baby boy Chinguun. His daughter Haliunaa, age 7, and son Bilguun, age 5, go to local primary school and kindergarten. 

This borrower has been working in various types of businesses since he graduated from secondary school. He has gained lot of experience in dealing with various types of people. He is now planning to start his own taxi service business in town and is now requesting 3,000,000 MNT to purchase an eco-friendly, energy-efficient second-hand car to start his taxi service. He is hardworking, helpful and an enthusiastic young man.

loans.use: to purchase an eco-friendly, energy-efficient second-hand car to start his taxi service business

loans.name: Nurgizar

texts.en:
Mrs. Nurgizar is 56 years old and lives with her husband and two children in a house in Bayan-Ulgii province, Mongolia. Her husband Birlestik works at a theater as a musician. Her daughter Bahitgul, age 20, and son Talgat, age 16, are university and secondary school students. 

This borrower has been running an organic meat products business in the local market for 15 years. She has gained a lot of experience as well as her customers' trust over the years. She is now requesting 1,000,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of meat and livestock from herders to sell to local customers. She is hardworking, open-minded and an optimistic woman.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of meat and livestock from herders and sell to local customers

loans.name: Bauerjan

texts.en: Bauerjan is 27 years old lives with his wife and daughter in a house in Bayan-Ulgii province of Mongolia. His wife Omirbek is currently staying home taking care of their baby daughter Ahbot, age 1. This borrower purchased a large truck to start his transportation business last year. Coal and firewood sales and now demand on coal and firewood ave decreased and now he is planning to purchase a large amount of wooden materials from another province. He is now requesting 3,500,000MNT to purchase a large amount of wooden materials to sell to local customers. He is hardworking and well-known in town.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of wooden materials to sell to local customers

loans.name: Selwin

texts.en:
Selwin is 54 years old and a widow with nine children, one of whom is in school. Selwin works very hard to provide for them.

Selwin runs a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 11000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Selwin has been in this business for 8 years.

In the future Selwin would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Niecel

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Niecel works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Niecel is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her food vending business.

Niecel has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for her business

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 14,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional fish to sell. Evangeline has been in this business for three years. Evangeline earns additional income from food vending.

Evangeline has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta offers bananas, white beans and mung beans within her locality. She has been doing her vending activity for 12 years. She is grateful because through her patience and commitment to improve her sales and profit, she is able obtain it smoothly.

Violeta is now asking for an additional loan of 13,000 PHP (Philippines pesos), which will enable her to buy stock of bananas and vegetable seeds to be sold (white beans and mung beans). She knows that through this additional capital she requested, she could further improve her sales and profit. In addition, she could supply all her customers and satisfy them. Violeta is hoping that lenders will continue to support her financial needs for the continuous growth of her business.

loans.use: to buy stock of bananas and vegetable seeds to be sold (white beans and mung beans) for her vegetable-vending business.

loans.name: Moraima

texts.es: Moraima, de 50 años de edad ,está casada y vive en compañía de su hija de 24 años y su pequeño nieto en su casa propia.El trabajo de Moraima consiste en la confección de prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños para esto se encarga con suma paciencia de elaborar las prendas que sus clientes le solicitan de manera particular y con frecuencia algunas prendas que ella misma crea. Algunas de ellas las pone a la venta en un pequeño espacio dentro de su hogar. Se dedica a éste trabajo desde hace 1 año, siempre ha trabajado sola y afirma que nunca tuvo algún reclamo por parte de sus clientes ya que ha visto la forma de complacerlos para que se vayan contentos. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede plasmar en un prenda el diseño en que se inspira además se siente muy útil; tiene como meta construir un taller de costura mucho mas grande y destinar un espacio únicamente destinado a la venta de sus creaciones.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500 soles, por ello agradece el apoyo financiero que le brindan para que pueda concretar sus planes.Con el monto solicitado comprará cierta cantidad de telas, hilos, elásticos, botones, cierres y otros accesorios que necesita para confeccionar algunas prendas que pondrá a la venta.
texts.en:
Moraima, 50, is married living with her 24-year-old daughter and little grandson in her own house.  Moraima’s work consists in making clothes for women, men and children.  To do so, she must have extreme patience to make the items her customers request and frequently to make items she designs herself.  She sells some of them in the small space she has set aside at home.  

She’s been in this work for a year and has always worked alone.  She states that she’s never had a complaint from her customers because she’s found the way to please them so they’ll leave happy.  What she likes about her work is that she can include into her clothing designs what most inspires her and besides she feels very useful.  Her goal is to build a larger sewing workshop and set aside space exclusively to sell the items she creates.  

On this occasion, she’ll request 1,500 soles.  She’s thankful for the financial support she’ll get so she can make her plans reality.  She will use the requested amount to buy a certain amount of fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, zippers and other accessories needed to make items of clothing she’ll put up for sale.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Maa Santoshi Self Help Group

texts.en:
Ranjulata is 40 years old, married and has two children. She is a native of the city of Jajpur, but she lives in the village of Chandikhole, of Odisha, India. 

Ranjulata is a housewife who is very happy and responsible. She alternates her household activities with her work in her business. She has a business of growing vegetables and paddy and selling them in the market of the Jajpur district of Odisha, India. She already has had this business for six years, and it is going very well. 

At this time, Ranjulata is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, seeds, and new and advanced tools for farming. She says that this will help her in strengthening the business and responding to client demand. 

This group is made up eleven members, all of whom are women. They all are neighbours and friends who formed the group Maa Santoshi Self Help Group (named after Lord Santoshi). The members of the group have selected Ranjulata as their president. The lady sitting second from the left-hand side and wearing a white saree in the photo is Ranjulata. The common goal of the group is to increase their business activity.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds, and new and advanced tools for farming.

loans.name: Javzandulam

texts.en:
Mrs. Javzandulam is a 49-year-old widow who lives with her two sons in a house in Huvsgul province of Mongolia. Her sons Ganzorig, age 28, and Gantulga, age 26, work at local companies. 

This borrower has been running her tailoring business at home since 2000. She has gained a lot of experience and regular customers over the years. She has covered family expense since then and paid her sons' education fees and living expenses. 

She is now requesting 2,600,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of inventory to run her tailoring business smoothly with no sudden pause. She is hardworking, responsible and an honest woman who also has good previous loan records at XacBank.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of inventory to run her tailoring business smoothly with no sudden pause

loans.name: Maria Rufina

texts.es:
Doña Maria, de 65 años de edad, una humilde comerciante, originaria de Rivas, pero actualmente vive en Managua, viuda, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comida.
Empezó en el ámbito del comercio a la edad de 30 años, con ayuda de su esposo, vendiendo comida, negocio que le genera muchos ingresos a  diarios, ya que ella cuenta con clientes fijos, pero luego ella quería obtener mas ganancias fue por eso que decidió ubicar el negocio fuera de su casa para que sus clientes se sintieran en un ambiente cómodo y familiar, con el propósito de ir creciendo cada día en su negocio, cuenta con el apoyo de una persona que le ayuda hacer la comida.
Sus expectativas es ampliarlo más para atraer más clientela. Ella esta solicitando para comprar  sillas, mesas, maseca, repollo, zanahoria, carne, pollo, yuca. Toda la materia prima que necesita para la elaboración de su comida.
texts.en:
María, 65, is a humble merchant originally from Rivas but currently living in Managua.  She’s widowed and works making and selling food.

She started in commerce at the age of 30 with help from her husband selling food, a business that generates high daily income since she has regular customers.  Later, she wanted to earn a higher profit which is why she decided to set up business outside her house so her customers would enjoy a more comfortable, family atmosphere aiming at continued daily growth in her business.  She has a person who helps her make the food.

Her expectation is to expand it more in order to tend to more customers.  She’s requesting to buy tables, chairs, Maseca [brand of cornmeal], cabbage, carrots, meat, chicken and manioc-all the raw materials needed to make the food.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, cornmeal, cabbage, carrots, meat, chicken and manioc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies such as thread, elastic, etc. and to pay to have his sewing machine serviced.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.en:
Making and selling furniture has been Ernesto's business involvement for more than 15 years. Aside from furniture, he also raises corn crops within his local community. Farming has been the primary source of income for most of the families nearby. With his sacrifices and dedication, he is able to improve his furniture finish. Nowadays, he is able to sell his finished furniture products within his locality and nearby municipalities. Ernesto hopes that his furniture shop business will continue to grow smoothly, for him to obtain better income and satisfy his customers' demand.

Ernesto would like to take a loan of PHP 18,000. The loan will allow him to buy wood, varnish and nails, for his manufacturing business. He knows that this amount of borrowed capital will help him to realize his goal, in life and in his business. He hopes that his requested loan amount will be granted, so he could give his family a better way of living and improve his financial status.

loans.use: to buy wood, varnish and nails, for his furniture manufacturing business

loans.name: Delfin

texts.en:
Delfin raises hogs and corn crops within his local community. He is happily married and has two children. He is thankful, because through his determination and patience, he is able to provide his family with basic commodities.

Now, he wants to have continuous growth of his agricultural business, so he could educate his two children, improve his financial stability, and improve his way of life. For his dreams to be achieved, he is asking for additional capital of PHP 12,000. He will use the loan to buy hog feed and essential vitamins for raising his hogs. He hopes and prays that lenders will grant his requested loan amount. Delfin knows that the amount he requested will enable him to become a better livelihood provider and entrepreneur, someday.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and essential vitamins for raising his hogs

loans.name: Isomidin

texts.ru:
Исомидин мужчина в возрасте  59 лет, проживает в сельской местности.  Женат и имеет 3-х детей.  Супруга так же как и Исомидин не имеет высшего образования и занимается воспитание внуков своих детей дома.  В свободное от воспитания время она помогает своему супругу по выращиванию хлопока, пшеницы и кукурузы.   Исомидин с юного возраста помогал своей семье по выращиванию различных злаковых культур.  Спустя некоторое время, он арендовал землю на которой и по сей день трудится.  По началу ему было очень тяжело, так как ему никто не помогал, кроме его супруги. Он имеет большой опыт в этой сфере.  Исомидин имеет хороший доход от выращивания культур. Исомидин взял кредит для выращивания пшеницы и хлопка.
 Исомидин узнал от своих знакомых , что МДО «Арванд» выдает кредиты и подал заявку.  Исомидин на полученный кредит хочет закупить семян и удобрение для почвы.
texts.en: Isomidin is a 59 year old man who lives in the countryside. He is married and has three adult children. Both Isomidin and his wife only have high school degrees and his wife stays home and raises the grandchildren. In her free time she assists her husband in growing cotton, wheat and corn. Since a young age Isomidin has been helping his family to grow various crops. After a while he was able to rent some land of his own and has been farming there ever since. At first it was hard to make ends meet as he had no other help aside from his wife. But as the result Isomidin has a lot of experience as a farmer and now makes a good profit from his land. Isomidin is taking out this loan to prepare for planting cotton and wheat. He learned from his friends that MDO "Arvand" gives out loans and put in an application. He is planning to use this money to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer for soil amendment

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La clienta  vive en Guayaquil. Empezó vendiendo comida fuera de su casa, actualmente entrega almuerzo en las construcciones, tiene una camioneta en el cual entrega los almuerzos.

Su dificultad es que en ocasiones tiene que suspender su negocio  x su enfermedad ya que ella es pvvs (paciente viviendo con vih sida). Otra de las dificultades es que hay clientes que se van sin pagar y eso es perdida para ella.No está casada, tiene hijas mayores de edad. 


Con el prestamo quiere comprar carnes, verduras, frutas para hacer mas comidas y tener asi mas ingresos.  Su sueño es poder tener un restaurante y trabajar junto a mis hijos dándoles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
She lives in Guayaquil and started selling food outside her house; she currently delivers lunch to construction sites and has a pick-up truck she uses to do her lunch deliveries.  The difficulty she has is that she occasionally has to suspend work due to her illness since she has PVVS (patient living with HIV/AIDS).  Another difficulty she faces is customers that leave without paying which represents a loss for her.  She’s not married but has adult daughters.

She wants to use the loan to buy meats, vegetables and fruit to make more meals and earn higher income.  Her dream is to be able to have a restaurant and to work with her children to provide them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables and fruit.

loans.name: Gantulga

texts.en:
Mr. Gantulga is 38 years old and lives with his wife and daughter in a house in Huvsgul province, Mongolia. His wife Erdenezul runs a small cafeteria in town. His daughter Togoldor, age 12, goes to a local school.

This borrower has been helping his wife to run her small cafeteria business in town for five years and he is now planning to start his own carpentry business at home. The borrower and his wife also grow organic vegetables in their plot of land. He is now requesting 1,000,000 MNt to purchase wood and other inventory items to start his own business making wooden furniture and other products manufactured at home. He is hardworking, positive and a diligent man.

loans.use: to purchase wood and other inventory items to start his own business making wooden furniture and other products manufactured at home

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
This is Milagros, 44, a resident of Intramuros, Manila, Philippines. She is married to Reynaldo, an employee, and they have children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Milagros operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece, at retail. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

She is requesting a PHP 39,000 loan, to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Milagros hopes that her business will continue to grow and dreams that her children will finish their studies.  She meets with her co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God.

All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for items to resell at her store, including groceries, toiletries and beverages

loans.name: Junecia

texts.en:
Junecia is 30 years old and married, with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Junecia runs a business selling plasticware in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional stocks of plasticware to sell.

Junecia has been in this business for two years. In the future, Junecia would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of plasticware to sell.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel is 33 years old, married, with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Maribel has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase more ingredients for her business.

Maribel has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru:
Баходур доброжелательный мужчина в возрасте 32 лет.  Он женат и имеет троих детей.  Вместе со своей семьёй он живёт в маленькой деревушке. Баходур очень любит природу, с юных лет он много времени проводил на пастбищном поле, помогая своему отцу выращивать скот.  Но теперь он имеет свою семью и делает всё для того, чтобы его жена и дети ни в чём не нуждались.  Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход для удовлетворения нужд семьи он начал своё дело, которому был обучен с юных лет.  Баходур занимается животноводством, разводит скот, выращивает их и потом продаёт. Этот бизнес приносит ему хороший доход. Поэтому он получает кредит для покупки скота.  Поначалу, когда он получил первый кредит у него было 2 голов скота, но в процессе реализации своего бизнеса количество скота увеличилось на 10 голов.  А также Баходур дополнительно занимается деканством и получает от этого дела небольшой доход.  Он выращивает разную сельскохозяйственную культуру, а потом продаёт её на рынке.  Сейчас Баходур хочет расширить свой существующий бизнес и на очередной кредит планирует купить скот.  Он очень надеется осуществить все свои поставленные задачи, которые помогут ему улучшить качество его жизни. 
Заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Bahodur is a good-natured 32 year old man. He is married and has three children. He lives in a small village together with his family. Bahodur loves nature and outdoors and since childhood has spent a lot of time in the pasture, where he helped his father raise cattle. Now he has his own family and is doing everything in his power to provide for his wife and children. To have a steady income and support his families needs, Bahodur has turned to the trade he knew since he was little: he raises cattle and sells the animals once they are mature. He makes a good living with this business and is taking out this loan to purchase more animals for his herd. At the time of his first loan Bahodur only had two cows but his herd has now grown to ten animals. Aside from raising cattle, Bahodur also grows produce on a small plot of land which yields additional profits. He grows various staples crops for sale at the local market. Now Bahodur wants to expand his business and will use the next loan to purchase another cow. He is hopeful that he will be able to complete all of his business goals so that he can improve life for his family. Bahodur is grateful in advance for Arvand's support.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es: Gladys, de 50 años de edad, es madre soltera y vive en compañía de sus cuatro hijos en su casa propia .El negocio que tiene Gladys es la venta de comidas regionales por las noches pero también prepara distintos platos de comida para venderlos en el horario de almuerzo. Atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes y esta actitud sumada a su buena sazón le ha permitido obtener muy buena acogida y demanda. Realiza este negocio desde hace 12 años con la ayuda de su hija. Le gusta su negocio pues comenta que le gusta cocinar, del mismo modo también le agrada el ingreso económico que obtiene por sus ventas los cuales le han permitido pagar sus cuentas y solventar los gastos básicos de su hogar.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500 soles, se siente contenta con el apoyo financiero que recibe para crecer con sus negocios.Con el monto solicitado comprará todos los ingredientes que usa en la preparación de sus platillos como carnes, plátanos, aceite, condimentos, arroz y otros.
texts.en:
Gladys, 50 years old, is a single mother and she lives with her four children in her own home. The business that Gladys has is selling regional food during evening hours but she also prepares different dishes to sell during lunchtime. She offers friendly service to her customers and this attitude added to her tasty dishes has permitted her to obtain high approval and demand. She has been in business for 12 years with the help of her daughter. She likes her business and says that she likes to cook, and also she likes the financial return that she obtains from her sales which have permitted her to pay  bills and basic household expenses.
 
At this time she is asking for 1500 soles and is happy with the financial help that she receives in order to grow with her businesses. She will use the requested amount to buy all the ingredients she uses in the preparation of her dishes such as meat, bananas, oil, condiments, rice and others.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as meat, bananas, oil, and other items.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
This is Amelia. She previously accessed a 21,000 PHP loan that she used to buy spare parts and accessories, and to pay for the maintenance, of their jeepney unit. Her earnings were a big help with their personal, household and business expenditures. She would like to apply for a 30,000 PHP loan to buy spare parts and for the maintenance of their jeepney. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. Amelia hopes that her business will continue to expand and dreams of having more business. She meets with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

- Curiously, Jeepneys have purely American origins. They were first used by American soldiers helping the Philippines throw off the invading Japanese. Filipino ingenuity, however, managed to see this vehicle as an opportunity to earn, and modified the Jeep into a 20-seater jeepney, open enough to provide adequate ventilation, sturdy for every-day travel, and cheap enough to buy and maintain. Now, the jeepneys are one of the things that makes the Philippines truly the Philippines.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and maintenance of her jeepney vehicle.

loans.name: Marcilyn

texts.en: Marcilyn is 30 years old and married. She works very hard to provide for the family. Marcilyn runs a retail charcoal business in the Philippines and has applied for a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell. Marcilyn has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is married and works hard to support her family. The operator of a general store in the Philippines for about a year, Elizabeth has requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to purchase food and household goods to sell such as canned goods, eggs, soft drinks, etc.

In the future, Elizabeth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase food and household goods to sell such as canned goods, eggs, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 45 years old, married, and has three children. She works hard to provide for her family. Rowena runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more items like soap, sugar, milk, coffee, canned goods, snack foods, etc. to sell.

Rowena has borrowed and paid 10 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years and also earns an income from food vending. Rowena aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items like soap, sugar, milk, coffee, canned goods, snack foods, etc. to sell

loans.name: Layly

texts.ru: Лайли 19 лет. Она молодая, красивая, трудолюбивая женщина. Она является одним из таких личностей, которая старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Она не замужем и на воспитании не имеет детей. Ее родители получает маленькую зарплату, а братья маленькие и еще не трудоспособные. Лайли решила помочь родителям для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес шитьем и продажи женской одежды, так как она очень умелая портниха. От полученного дохода она планирует улучшить условию проживания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Layly is 19 years old. She is a beautiful and hard working young woman. Layly is a kind of person who always tries to improve life and economic situation of her family. She is not married and has no children of her own, but her parents earn little and her two brothers are young and cannot work. Layly wants to help her parents provide for the family and so she took the class "Achieve Success" organized by the Association of Businesswomen and earned her certificate. Now Layly is competent to organize her own business and become successful. She wants to start a sewing studio and subsequently sell her products at the market as Layly is a talented seamstress. She is planning to use the profits from her business to improve her family's living situation. Layly is requesting a loan of 2000 somoni to purchase a sewing machine for herself. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for organizing new business

loans.name: Hilola

texts.ru: Хилола хорошая женщина. Ей 29 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Она давно мечтала заняться каким-нибудь видом бизнеса, но раньше у нее не было, ни средств, ни какой либо поддержки. Так как Хилола живет в сельской местности, она имеет опыт скотоводстве и выращивание сельхоз культуры. После того так как она обучилась в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин, у нее появилась возможность организовать свой бизнес. От данного курса, она получила  много новой информации, и теперь она нуждается в деньгах, чтобы организовать свой бизнес. Она хочет организовать бизнес купле продажи скота. Хилола запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Hilola is a good woman. She is 29 years old, single and lives with her parents. She has always dreamed to start her own business but in the past she had no support and no savings. As Hilola lives in rural Tajikistan she has experience raising cattle and growing crops. After she took the class "Achieve Success" organized by Association of Businesswomen she was able to plan her business on her own. The class provided her with all current information on budgeting and organizing a business, but now Hilola needs money to get started. Hilola plans to raise cattle for resale as her trade and she is requesting a loan of 3000 US dollars to purchase cattle. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle for organizing a new business

loans.name: Luz Berenice

texts.es: A sus 48 años, Luz Berenice se dedica a la confección en un pequeño taller ubicado en su residencia, aprendió el oficio por tradición familiar y cuenta con más de 20 años de experiencia. Actualmente cuenta con una línea propia de pijamas, las cuales son comercializadas en diferentes almacenes de su municipio. Con el propósito de mejorar los ingresos de su hogar, Luz decidió iniciar una venta de helados en su vivienda, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de surtido. Espera que su condición económica mejore y pueda garantizarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Luz Berenice, 48 years old, is a seamstress in her small workshop located in her home. She learned the trade by family tradition and has more than 20 years experience. Currently she has her own line of pajamas which are sold in various stores in her municipality. 

With the idea of improving her household income, Luz decided to begin selling ice cream at home, which is why she is requesting a loan in order to buy an assortment. She hopes that her financial situation will improve and she can secure better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy products for the preparation of ice cream

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es: Domingo de 58 años de edad se dedica al cultivo de maiz y sorgo desde hace mas de 30 años es responsable, trabajador y honesto vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus 4 hijos de 23, 19, 13, y 4 años actualmente estudian. Cuando ya tiene su cosecha lista la almacena en los graneros que aparecen en la foto para luego salir a comercializarla y con las ganancias que obtiene de la venta ha podido salir adelante con su familia, ha solventado todos los gastos que se le presentan dia a dia, el Señor Domingo esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos agricolas como: semillas, fertilizantes, abonos y otras herramientas que le ayudaran a poder seguir consechando sus cultivos ya que esa esa su unica fuente de trabajo y tener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia lo que necesita sin tener ninguna limitante.
texts.en:
Domingo, 58 years old, have been growing maize and sorghum for over 30 years. He is responsible, hardworking and honest. He lives in his own house with his wife and 4 children, who are 23, 19, 13 and 4 years old. At present they are studying. 

When his crop is ready, he stores it in the silos that you can see in the photo. Subsequently, he sells it and the earnings he makes from the sale enable him to provide for his family. He has gotten bills arise every day and has been able to pay them all.  

Domingo is requesting a loan in order to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilisers and manure, and other tools. He will then have what he needs to continue to harvest his crops, as this is his only source of work. In this way he can improve his income and so give his family everything they need.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies (fertilisers, seeds etc.)

loans.name: Esperanza Y Progreso Group

texts.es: El grupo “ ESPERANZA Y PROGRESO”  se encuentra pasando el ciclo 28 es un grupo recurrentes son puntuales en sus cuotas. Este grupo está conformado por 5 mujeres emprendedoras dedicadas a diversas actividades del comercio. Noemí es secretaria del grupo tiene 37 años conviviente con 3 hijos. Se dedica a la venta de comida hace 19 años y a la vez trabaja en la INABIF. En sus tiempos libres prepara chocoteja. Su mayor deseo es tener un restaurant de comida rápida. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de sillas y mesas. El grupo agradece  a los inversionistas KIVA. Noemí es la primera del lado izquierdo.
texts.en: The “ ESPERANZA Y PROGRESO” group is in its 28th cycle and has been on time with its payments.  This group is made up of five enterprising women who have various businesses.
